channel.title: Hitting not the same when attack/strength
channel.description:
when i train on my server strength to 99.. i hit about 20 max i think... but when i put on attack i hit about 30.. now i want to ask.. how do i fix this
if (FightType == 1 || FightType == 2 || FightType == 3 || FightType == 4) {
not sure if that is good.. but help!?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 27, 2007, 07:13:26 AM[/size][hr]help!?

item.title: Hitting not the same when attack/strength
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

No, it’s not at all. Go to public void CalculateMaxHit(), then show me the method and i’ll fix it.

Read full topic
